name: Comet (EllenElzai)
description:
This is a solo project I made for the GMTK 2018 Game Jam. It's a Platformer game without platforms!

Space Bar to leave the orbit of a planet

WASD or Arrow Keys to move slightly while in flight

All assets, including music, sound effects, art, etc., were either made by me or were default textures/fonts in Unity. I used Reason Essentials for the music and sounds.

Let me know what you think!
